description:
Welcome to T-Mobile, where we are committed to connecting our customers to the future of wireless communication. We are currently seeking a dynamic and driven Sponsorships Manager to join our team and help us continue to grow and evolve in the ever-changing telecommunications industry. As a Sponsorships Manager, you will be responsible for identifying and securing strategic partnerships and sponsorships that align with our brand and drive business growth. We are looking for a highly motivated individual with a passion for building relationships and a proven track record of success in the sponsorship space. If you are a creative thinker with excellent communication skills and a strong understanding of the sponsorship landscape, we want to hear from you!

Develop and execute a comprehensive sponsorship strategy that aligns with T-Mobile's overall business goals and brand image.

Identify and build relationships with potential partners and sponsors, including but not limited to sports teams, events, and organizations.

Negotiate and secure sponsorship agreements that deliver value to T-Mobile and its partners.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate sponsorships into marketing campaigns and initiatives.

Monitor industry trends and competitive landscape to identify new sponsorship opportunities and stay ahead of the curve.

Develop and manage sponsorship budgets, ensuring efficient and effective use of resources.

Analyze and report on the success of sponsorships, providing insights and recommendations for future partnerships.

Serve as the main point of contact for partners and sponsors, maintaining positive relationships and ensuring contractual obligations are met.

Work closely with legal and compliance teams to ensure all sponsorships are in line with company policies and regulations.

Stay informed on industry regulations and guidelines for sponsorships and ensure compliance.

T-Mobile is an Equal Opportunity Employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees. We do not discriminate based upon race, religion, color, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, status as a protected veteran, status as an individual with a disability, or other applicable legally protected characteristics.
